I.ii.1.C.1.k
.
Matching Program Reports Processed by PMCs
The PMCs receive and process all reports from matching programs involving pension and survivor benefit recipients.  Matches involving compensation entitlement must be processed at a VSC.
Reference
:  For more information on matching program processing, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 1
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
